ext_weather.name: Tonight
ext_weather.shortForecast: Showers And Thunderstorms then Mostly Cloudy
ext_weather.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms before 9pm, then a slight chance of showers and thunderstorms between 9pm and 10pm. Some of the storms could produce heavy rain. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 69. South wind 0 to 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.
